QuestData.Title: Blind Fury
QuestData.Description: Tarenar wasn't joking when he said that he didn't care about judgment and caution. He nearly took off that high elf's head as he ran into the Plaguewood, looking for Gidwin. You should go after him.$b$bThe Plaguewood is a big place, $n. Good luck. I hope to see you $g boys: three; come out of the woods in one piece.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Tarenar Sunstrike within the Plaguewood in Eastern Plaguelands.
QuestData.RewardText: I haven't found anything but brainless undead, and plenty of them. I was just about to kill my way into Stratholme when you arrived.$b$bDid you have any more success?
